table.name: vtiger_meetingnotes
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_meetingnotes` ( `meetingnotesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `meeting_note` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`meetingnotesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_meetingnotescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_meetingnotescf` ( `meetingnotesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`meetingnotesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
